CustomField.formula: IF( (!ISBLANK( EPS_Start_Hold_Time__c) && !ISBLANK( EPS_End_Hold_Time__c )) , (( EPS_End_Hold_Time__c- EPS_Start_Hold_Time__c ) * 24+ IF( ISBLANK(Past_EPS_Engineering_in_Hours__c),0,Past_EPS_Engineering_in_Hours__c )) , IF( (!ISBLANK( EPS_Start_Hold_Time__c ) && ISBLANK( EPS_End_Hold_Time__c)), (( now() - EPS_Start_Hold_Time__c) * 24+ IF( ISBLANK(Past_EPS_Engineering_in_Hours__c),0,Past_EPS_Engineering_in_Hours__c )),0))
CustomField.label: Waiting for EPS in Hours
